item.title: Help a noob? pleaseeee my source doesnt like me
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

try this

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("******") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("******") || playerRights >= 2))) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 00995 10"); }

change the ****** with ur char name and then u and other ppl that have rights above 2 can do pickup

item.title: Help a noob? pleaseeee my source doesnt like me
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) {
         int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
         int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
         if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
            addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
         } else {
            sM("No such item.");
         }
      } else {
         sM("usage ::pickup 800 100");
      }
       }
}

Try that.

item.title: Help a noob? pleaseeee my source doesnt like me
item.dc:creator: @blahblah112 blahblah112
item.description:
@blahblah112 wrote:

ok this is the pickup code i want to be able to pickup godswords and stuff… (project czar it hates me )
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights > 1) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sM(“usage ::pickup 800 100”);
}
}
}
please help me or give me a better code so i can GET GODSWORDS…-.-
ohhh and uhh… how do i add new items? like i add the code to item then i compile it? cuz that didnt work…

Read full topic
